long_description: The Tosca bike capri skort combines cute styling with cycling performance. Technical fabric and a chamois make it a great choice for comfortable rides. Nylon/spandex fabric quickly wicks moisture to keep you dry. Skirt has side vents so you have a full range of motion while riding. Hidden pocket under skirt. Capris are calf-length. Elastic grippers at leg hems hold the capris in position. The Tosca bike capri skort has reflective logos to keep you visible in low light. Next-to-skin fit.
